title: The Sirin
description: Jointed hard plastic plug with silicone add-ons, googley-eyes, and a teeny weeny yellow polka dot bikini; specially designed to capture the attentions and bodies of lonely fish.

title: The Wagner
tag: Shield shall be splintered! A sword day! A red day! Ere the sun rises! Ride now! Ride now! Ride!
description: Far superior to conventional rattlers, a complex internal mechanism produces a faithful rendition of the orchestral music from act 3 of Richard Wagner's Die Walk√ºre.

title: The Donald
tag: It's going to be great; it's going to be beautiful.
description: Inspired by the 45th President of the United States, this classy gilded crankbait only catches non-native species of fish.
